Title: Where's The Chief?
Description:
This is the only part of the fortress we haven't yet searched, $n. If Commander Eranog is anywhere, it has to be here.

<Velomir glances towards the nearby doorway.>

Let us see what we can find out.
ObjectivesText: Accompany Guardian Velomir and inspect the Lookout Tower within South Hold Gate.
RewardText: Damn it all! The commander was behind this? I cannot believe he would betray us like this.
